R

recalculateValues() - Method in class SpaceShooters.Ship.ShipCannon
Recalculates the shot damage and shot speed based on the current level.
recalculateValues() - Method in class SpaceShooters.Ship.ShipCrew
Recalculates the reload time, active barrier renewal value, passive barrier renewal value, and movement speed based on the current level.
recalculateValues() - Method in class SpaceShooters.Ship.ShipShield
Recalculates the HP bonus, maximum passive barrier HP, and maximum active barrier HP based on the current level.
receiveDamage(Shot) - Method in class SpaceShooters.Ship.Ship
Applies damage to the ship's HP after handling barriers.
receiveExperience(int) - Method in class SpaceShooters.Player
Increases the player's experience points and upgrades ship components if the player levels up.
receiveMoney(int) - Method in class SpaceShooters.Player
Adds money to the player's current amount, scaled by the money multiplier.

Registers a new player.
